___name.x-prompt: What should be the name of the Effect?

___creators.x-prompt: Do you want to use the create function?
___creators.description: Specifies whether to use creator functions for handling actions, reducers, and effects.

___skipTest.description: When true, does not create test files.

___api.x-prompt: Should we wire up success and failure actions?
___api.description: Specifies if effect has api success and failure actions wired up

___minimal.description: Setup root effects module without registering initial effects.

___module.x-prompt: To which module (path) should the effect be registered in?
___module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

___root.description: Flag to indicate whether the effects are registered as root.

___flat.description: Flag to indicate if a dir is created.

___path.description: The path to create the component.

___feature.description: Flag to indicate if part of a feature schematic.
